body: The year is 3406 and instead of making new and better doujins mf's will still be editing/coloring/translating the same old Naruto doujins by Karakishi Youhei-dan(Sahara Wataru)
Why do people do this man... Why post an incomplete coloring? Either finish it then post the completed version or don't post at all. No one's rushing you
It's a shame Sahara's pretty much the best artist who does Naruto stuff on a regular basis. I could tolerate the Sakura bias but then he started doing that pedophile shit with Sarada.
Sakura with big breasts tag is ??
